      About

      I am a technologist and entrepreneur with a wide variety of experience in Product Management, Full-Stack web development (Python, React, NextJs, Typescript) and Machine Learning (NLP).

      On the founding team of AugmentCXM (Acquired by Sutherland) I built AI/ML productivity tools for call centers that support thousands of agents in delivering better outcomes to millions of customers.

      I created and maintain AdAccelerator an open source Chrome Extension with 20,000+ users and 300+ stars on Github.

      Outside of work I enjoy hiking, chess (~1500), power lifting, and have been learning Chinese.
